description.p: GIMP 2.99.16 marks the end of the GTK+3 port as there is no massive usage of deprecated GTK API anymore. We are therefore getting extremely close to release candidates! Apart from internal work on the codebase, here are some of the more visible improvements:

ul.li: Action search now displays the menu path for actions and a help icon
An action is generated for every third-party GEGL operation
GEGL operations can register a menu item through the "gimp:menu-path" key
Log-off and shutdown can be inhibited when images are not saved
New option "Merge menu and title bar" for client-side decorations on image windows
New "Middle Gray (CIELAB)" fill option (new image or new layer)
The Stroke Selection dialog has been reorganized
New "Grayscale (%)" view in Color Picker tool's info window and sample points
Better ACO color palettes support, ported to babl, including CIELAB palettes
Themes are still being worked on
JPEG-XL: initial support for CMYK/A export
PSD: support of clipping path import and export
PSD: compatibility warning dialogs raised on import and export, when relevant
TIFF: PSD metadata and IBM PC layers now supported on import
JPEG: PSD metadata and clipping paths now supported on import
DDS: OpenMP support enabled when available
FITS: import and export code ported to cfitsio, resulting in much better coverage
Newly added support for import and export: PAM and QOI
Newly added import-only support: Amiga IFF/ILBM and DCX
Script-Fu: new type 'byte' to handle binary data

description.p: GIMP 2.99.14 was released with the following noteworthy improvements:

ul.li: Align and Distribute tool: completely reworked usage
Text tool: new "Outlined" and "Outlined and filled" options
Floating selections not created anymore when pasting new layers
New "Gray" theme based on a 18.42% luminance middle-gray background
Icon sizes can be overriden in Preferences > Themes
Faster save of XCF files
XCF file format improved with a proper structure for path items
PDF export: new "Root layers only" sub-option for "Layers as pages"
AVIF export: improved compatibility with various browsers' implementations
PSD export: CMYK support added
JPEG-XL: metadata are now imported and exported
ICNS: initial import/export support
TIFF import: new option "Show reduced images"
More progression for the GTK+3 port
New and modified functions or classes for the upcoming 3.0 API

description.p: One step further towards GIMP 3.0, GIMP 2.99.12 comes along with the following noteworthy improvements:
Met volgende noemenswaardige verbeteringen komt GIMP 2.99.12 weer een stap dichterbij GIMP 3.0:

ul.li: New "Stroke borders" option in Bucket Fill tool's "Fill by line art detection"
Nieuwe optie ‘Penseelranden’ in functie ‘Vul volgens omtrekdetectie’ van Emmergereedschap
Redesigned and reorganized "Fill by line art detection" settings
Opnieuw ontworpen en gereorganiseerde instellingen voor "Vullen volgens omtrekdetectie"
New "Default" and "Compact" themes with dark and light variants
New "Drag-to-zoom" behavior and speed settings in Preferences
On-canvas modifiers are now customizable
Tool pointer settings reorganized and moved from "Image Windows" to "Input Devices" tabs in Preferences
De instellingen van de muisaanwijzer zijn gereorganiseerd en verplaatst van tabblad "Afbeeldingsvensters" naar "Invoerapparaten" in Voorkeuren
Improved handling of unchecked "Show pointer for paint tools" option
Verbeterde verwerking van de niet-aangevinkte optie "Muisaanwijzer tonen bij tekengereedschap"
Touchpad gesture rotation (2-finger pinch) on canvas
Preview size in item dockables now settable with Ctrl+wheel and pinch gesture
Gradient editor can be zoomed with pinch gesture
New soft-proofing toggle in the status bar, with pop-over settings on right click
CMYK export implemented and import improved for JPEG, using the soft-proofing profile
CMYK(A) import and export support for 8 and 16-bit TIFF files, using the soft-proofing profile
Improved CMYK import support for PSD files, using the soft-proofing profile
The CMYK color selector is now simulation-space (soft-proofing) aware
Added support for the BigTIFF file format
Het BigTIFF-bestandsformaat wordt nu ondersteund
Minimal support of Duotone PSD files
SVG import can now disable size parsing (with security implications)
New option "Number of repeats" in GIF export
Nieuwe optie ‘Aantal herhalingen’ bij exporteren naar GIF
PNG export has a new settings to optimize the palette size of indexed images
New "Flip image" option in DDS export, as needed by some game engines
Various improvements to DDS support, in particular for 16-bit channels
Various improvements to FLI support
Various improvements to RAW data support
New WBMP format initial support
New ANI format initial support
Huge internal work on script-fu
New command line option --quit to quit GIMP immediately after running batch commands, propagating script failure in exit code
The command line option --batch-interpreter is now mandatory for --batch as there is no default interpreter anymore
Many plug-in API improvements

description.p: GIMP 2.99.10 is a notable development release in the 2.99 series, featuring many changes. Let's mention in particular:
GIMP 2.99.10 là bản phát hành phát triển đáng kể trong sê-ri 2.99, nhiều tính năng thay đổi. Đề cập chi tiết:
Gimp 2.99.10 is een opmerkelijke ontwikkelingsuitgave in de 2.99-serie, met veel wijzigingen, o.a.:
GIMP 2.99.10 is a notable development release in the 2.99 series, featuring many changes. Let's mention in particular:

ul.li: "Linked layers" concept superseded by new "Layer set" concept
Khái niệm "Linked layers" bị thay thế bởi "Layer set"
Het concept "Gekoppelde lagen" is vervangen door nieuw concept "Set van lagen"
"Linked layers" concept superseded by new "Layer set" concept
Lock icons in item dockables (Layers, Channels, Paths) moved next to the visibility (eye) icon
Vergrendelingspictogrammen in dokbare dialoogvensters (lagen, kanalen, paden) verplaatst naast het zichtbaarheidspictogram (oog)
Lock icons in item dockables (Layers, Channels, Paths) moved next to the visibility (eye) icon
Alt-click on visibility and lock icons in item dockables massively toggles visibility and locks among selected items
Alt-klik op zichtbaarheids- en vergrendelingspictogrammen in dokbare dialoogvensters schakelt de zichtbaarheid en vergrendeling van meerdere geselecteerde items in/uit
Alt-click on visibility and lock icons in item dockables massively toggles visibility and locks among selected items
Item dockables now display icon headers for visibility and locks column
Dokbare dialoogvensters hebben nu titel-pictogrammen voor zichtbaarheid en vergrendeling
Our System theme shows visible hints around unset visibility and locks icons when hovering them in item dockables
Ons systeemthema toont zichtbare hints bij niet-ingestelde zichtbaarheid en vergrendeling pictogrammen wanneer u de muis erboven houdt
New checkbox to enable or disable dynamics in paint tools' options (replacing "Dynamics Off" dynamics)
Nieuw selectievakje om dynamiek in of uit te schakelen in de opties van tekengereedschap (ter vervanging van dynamiek optie "Geen dynamiek")
New tickbox to enable or disable dynamics in paint tools' options (replacing "Dynamics Off" dynamics)
Improved support for Wayland and macOS Big Sur (and newer)
Tăng cường hỗ trợ cho Wayland và macOS Big Sur (và mới hơn)
Verbeterde ondersteuning voor Wayland en macOS Big Sur (en nieuwer)
Improved support for Wayland and macOS Big Sur (and newer)
"Fill by line art detection" in Bucket Fill tool has a new option
‘Vullen volgens omtrekdetectie’ van het gereedschap emmer heeft een nieuwe optie
"Fill by line art detection" in Bucket Fill tool has a new option
Channels and paths multi-selectable with part of relevant actions working
Kanalen en paden zijn multi-selecteerbaar waarbij een deel van de relevante acties werkt
Channels and paths multi-selectable with part of relevant actions working
Various file format support improvements, in particular to PSD, JPEG-XL and HEIF
Tăng cường hỗi trợ nhiều định dạng, cụ thể là PSD, JPEG-XL và HEIF
Verschillende verbeteringen in ondersteunde bestandsindelingen, met name voor PSD, JPEG-XL en HEIF
Various file format support improvements, in particular to PSD, JPEG-XL and HEIF
New support of Microsoft Windows Cursor file format (.cur files)
Nieuwe ondersteuning van Microsoft Windows Cursor-bestandsindeling (.cur-bestanden)
New support of Microsoft Windows Cursor file format (.cur files)
Removed KDE and GNOME screenshot portals in favor of Freedesktop one
Freedesktop in plaats van KDE en GNOME schermafdruk portals
Removed KDE and GNOME screenshot portals in favor of Freedesktop one
Windows screenshot implementation now has an "Include mouse pointer" option
Windows-schermafdrukimplementatie heeft nu een optie ‘Inclusief muisaanwijzer’
Windows screenshot implementation now has an "Include mouse pointer" option
New and modified libgimp API for plug-in developers
Nieuwe en aangepaste libgimp-API voor plug-in-ontwikkelaars
New and modified libgimp API for plug-in developers

description.p: While during this fourth cycle of development, many efforts were devoted to infrastructure, GIMP 2.99.8 still received many welcome improvements, notably:
Terwijl tijdens deze vierde ontwikkelingscyclus veel inspanningen werden besteed aan infrastructuur, kreeg GIMP 2.99.8 nog steeds veel welkome verbeteringen, met name:
Lai gan šajā (ceturtajā) izstrādes ciklā uzmanība pārsvarā tika veltīta infrastruktūrai, GIMP 2.99.8 saņēma daudzus uzlabojumus, būtiskākie:
While during this fourth cycle of development, many efforts were devoted to infrastructure, GIMP 2.99.8 still received many welcome improvements, notably:

ul.li: New modes in Clone, Heal and Perspective Clone tools when multiple layers are selected
Chế độ mới trong công cụ Clone, Heal và Perspective Clone khi nhiều lớp được chọn
Nieuwe modi in de gereedschappen Klonen, Repareren en Perspectief Klonen wanneer meerdere lagen zijn geselecteerd
Jauni režīmi klonēšanas, lāpīšanas un perspektīvas rīkiem, kad ir izvēlēti vairāki slāņi.
New modes in Clone, Heal and Perspective Clone tools when multiple layers are selected
Windows Ink support for input devices on Windows
Windows Ink-ondersteuning voor invoerapparaten op Windows
Windows Ink support for input devices on Windows
Clicking on toolbox or Wilber's drop area actively focuses the canvas
Door op de gereedschapskist of het gebied van Wilber te klikken, wordt het canvas actief gemaakt
Clicking on toolbox or Wilber's drop area actively focuses the canvas
Marching ants display ported to Wayland and macOS Big Sur logics
Marcherende mieren toegepast in Wayland en macOS Big Sur logics
Marching ants display ported to Wayland and macOS Big Sur logics
Initial implementation of config folder migration for GIMP 3
Bắt đầu thực hiện việc chuyển đổi thư mục cấu hình cho GIMP 3
Initiële implementatie van inrichting configuratiemap voor GIMP 3
Initial implementation of config folder migration for GIMP 3
Action "view-rotate-reset" renamed to "view-reset" and new "view-rotate-reset" and "view-flip-rotate" actions
Thao tác "view-rotate-reset" được đổi tên thành "view-reset" và thao tác mới "view-rotate-reset" và "view-flip-rotate"
De actie "Beeld-draaien ongedaan maken" hernoemd naar "Beeld-spiegelen en draaien ongedaan maken" en nieuwe acties "Beeld-spiegelen en draaien" en "Beeld-spiegelen en draaien-ongedaan maken"
Action "view-rotate-reset" renamed to "view-reset" and new "view-rotate-reset" and "view-flip-rotate" actions
PSD: bigger-than-4GiB file support and up to 99 channels
PSD: hỗ trợ tập tin lớn hơn 4GiB và tới 99 kênh
PSD: ondersteuning voor bestanden groter dan 4GB en tot 99 kanalen
PSD: bigger-than-4GiB file support and up to 99 channels
PSB: new support (loading only)
PSB: hỗ trợ mới (chỉ tải thôi)
PSB: nieuwe ondersteuning (alleen laden)
PSB: new support (loading only)
SGI: 16-bit images support
SGI: hỗ trợ ảnh 16-bit
SGI: ondersteuning voor 16-bits afbeeldingen
SGI: 16-bit images support
JPEG XL: new support (loading and exporting)
JPEG XL: hỗ trợ mới (tải và xuất)
JPEG XL: nieuwe ondersteuning (laden en exporteren)
JPEG XL: new support (loading and exporting)
New API functions gimp_display_present() and gimp_procedure_dialog_fill_expander()
Hàm API mới gimp_display_present() và gimp_procedure_dialog_fill_expander()
Nieuwe API-functies gimp_display_present() en gimp_procedure_dialog_fill_expander()
New API functions gimp_display_present() and gimp_procedure_dialog_fill_expander()
Much porting to newer API, code cleanup and bug fixing done
Nhiều chuyển đổi sang API mới, dọn dẹp mã và thực hiện sửa lỗi
Veel code is vertaald naar nieuwere API, opgeruimd en op fouten gecontroleerd
Much porting to newer API, code cleanup and bug fixing done

description.p: For this third development release, more development effort has been shifted towards the API. Many functions were renamed for consistent naming scheme, some new functions appeared, some had signature changes, fixes were made to improve introspection binding of others, and so on. More API updates are to be expected on further development releases where stability is not guaranteed.

Đối với bản phát hành phát triển thứ ba này, nhiều nỗ lực phát triển đã được chuyển sang API. Nhiều chức năng đã được đổi tên cho sơ đồ đặt tên nhất quán, một số chức năng mới xuất hiện, một số có thay đổi chữ ký, các bản sửa lỗi đã được thực hiện để cải thiện ràng buộc nội tâm của những hàm khác, v.v. Nhiều bản cập nhật API hơn dự kiến sẽ được mong đợi trên các bản phát hành phát triển tiếp theo, nơi sự ổn định không được đảm bảo.

Voor deze derde ontwikkelingsrelease is meer energie gestoken in de API. Veel functies werden hernoemd voor een consistent namenschema, sommige nieuwe functies verschenen, sommige hadden handtekeningwijzigingen, er zijn correcties aangebracht om de introspectiebinding van anderen te verbeteren, enzovoort. Er zijn meer API-updates te verwachten bij verdere ontwikkelingsreleases waar stabiliteit niet is gegarandeerd.

For this third development release, more development effort has been shifted towards the API. Many functions were renamed for consistent naming scheme, some new functions appeared, some had signature changes, fixes were made to improve introspection binding of others, and so on. More API updates are to be expected on further development releases where stability is not guaranteed.
Regarding end-creator changes, some notable improvements are:
Về những thay đổi của người tạo cuối, một số cải tiến đáng chú ý là:
Voor de eindgebruiker zijn enkele opmerkelijke verbeteringen:
Regarding end-creator changes, some notable improvements are:

ul.li: Canvas Size dialog now displays a template selector
Hộp thoại “Cỡ vùng vẽ” giờ hiển thị bộ chọn mẫu
In het dialoogvenster Canvasgrootte kun je nu een sjabloon kiezen
Adiwenni n n tiddi n teɣzut n usuneɣ ad ibeqqeḍ tura amafran n teɣruft
Canvas Size dialogue now displays a template selector
Off-canvas guides are now allowed
Cho phép đường dẫn hướng nằm ngoài vùng vẽ
Hulplijnen kunnen nu buiten het canvas worden geplaatst
Off-canvas guides are now allowed
The experimental Paint Select tool got various improvements
Công cụ Chọn bằng cách Vẽ thử nghiệm có nhiều cải tiến khác nhau
Het experimentele gereedschap Penseelselectie werd flink verbeterd
The experimental Paint Select tool got various improvements
More fixes for Wayland support
Sửa nhiều lỗi để hỗ trợ Wayland
Betere ondersteuning voor Wayland
More fixes for Wayland support
Dialog dropped for the Freedesktop portal implementation of the screenshot plug-in
Thả hộp thoại để thực hiện cổng Freedesktop của trình cắm chụp ảnh màn hình
In de Freedesktop-portalimplementatie van de screenshot-plug-in is de dialoog verwijderd
Dialogue dropped for the Freedesktop portal implementation of the screenshot plug-in
PNG import creates an ICC profile out of the gAMA and/or cHRM chunks
Nhập PNG tạo một hồ sơ ICC từ các khối gAMA và / hoặc cHRM
PNG-import maakt een ICC-profiel uit de gAMA- en/of cHRM-segmenten
PNG import creates an ICC profile out of the gAMA and/or cHRM chunks
TIFF export stores the ICC profile and comment on each layer to prevent ambiguous files
Xuất TIFF lưu trữ hồ sơ ICC và ghi chú về từng lớp để ngăn chặn các tập tin không rõ ràng
TIFF export slaat het ICC-profiel en commentaar op in elke laag op om problemen te voorkomen
TIFF export stores the ICC profile and comment on each layer to prevent ambiguous files

description.p: This second development release contains various usability and API updates. A new experimental tool makes an entrance in the playground.
Bản phát triển thứ hai này chứa nhiều bản cập nhật API và khả năng sử dụng khác nhau. Một công cụ thử nghiệm mới tạo ra một lối vào sân chơi.
Ovo je druga razvojna verzija koja poboljšava upotrebljivost programa i donosi unapređenja API-ja. Novi, eksperimentalni alati su dostupni u igraonici.
Ово је друга развојна верзија која побољшава употребљивост програма и доноси унапређења АПИ-ја. Нови, експериментални алати су доступни у играоници.
Deze tweede ontwikkelingsrelease bevat verschillende bruikbaarheids- en API-updates. Een nieuwe experimentele tool maakt zijn entree in de speeltuin.
This second development release contains various usability and API updates. A new experimental tool makes an entrance in the playground.

ul.li: Many usability improvements on the slider widget
Nhiều cải tiến về khả năng sử dụng trên điều khiển con trượt
Puno poboljšanja vezanih za vidžete sa klizačima
Пуно побољшања везаних за виџете са клизачима
Veel verbeteringen in het gebruik van het schuifbalk element
Vairāki lietojamības uzlabojumi slīdņa logdaļai
スライダーウィジェットのユーザビリティの改善
Nombreuses améliorations d’usage du composant curseur
Many usability improvements on the slider widget
Usability cleaning in the Layers dockable
Poboljšanja vezana za prikačive slojeve
Побољшања везана за прикачиве слојеве
Het Lagenvenster is makkelijker in gebruik
Nettoyages concernant la convivialité du groupe de calques
Usability cleaning in the Layers dockable
The action search now shows all actions even inactive ones (yet pushed below)
Tìm kiếm hành động giờ hiển thị tất cả các hành động ngay cả những hành động không hoạt động (chưa được đẩy xuống bên dưới)
Pretraga od sada prikazuje sve radnje, čak i neaktivne (ali objavljene ovde)
Претрага од сада приказује све радње, чак и неактивне (али објављене овде)
De actiezoekopdracht toont nu alle acties, zelfs inactieve (maar wel onderaan)
The action search now shows all actions even inactive ones (yet pushed below)
Fonts targeted for Korean and Japanese language show appropriate characters
Phông chữ mục tiêu cho ngôn ngữ Hàn Quốc và Nhật Bản hiển thị các ký tự thích hợp
Lettertypen voor Koreaans en Japans tonen de juiste tekens
Fonts targeted for Korean and Japanese language show appropriate characters
Different default tools depending on pointer device type
Các công cụ mặc định khác nhau tùy thuộc vào loại thiết bị con trỏ
Drugačiji podrazumevani alati u zavisnosti od tipa uređaja
Другачији подразумевани алати у зависности од типа уређаја
Verschillende standaardgereedschappen, afhankelijk van het type aanwijzerapparaat
Different default tools depending on pointer device type
Default dynamics is now "Pressure Size"
Động mặc định bây giờ là “Kích thước áp suất”
Podrazumevana dinamika je od sada „Jačina pritiska“
Подразумевана динамика је од сада „Јачина притиска“
Standaardpenseelgedrag is nu ‘Drukgrootte’
Default dynamics is now "Pressure Size"
Various usability improvements in the Input Device editor
Nhiều cải tiến khả năng sử dụng khác nhau trong trình chỉnh sửa Thiết bị đầu vào
Razna unapređenja vezana za uređivanje ulaznih uređaja
Разна унапређења везана за уређивање улазних уређаја
Verschillende verbeteringen in de bruikbaarheid in de editor van het invoerapparaat
Various usability improvements in the Input Device editor
New "Paint Select" experimental tool in the playground
Công cụ thử nghiệm “Chọn bằng cách Vẽ” mới trong sân chơi
Novi alat „Izbor crtanjem“ je dostupan na igralištu
Нови алат „Избор цртањем“ је доступан на игралишту
Nieuwe experimentele tool "Paint Select" in de Experimentele afdeling in Voorkeuren
New "Paint Select" experimental tool in the playground
Plug-in API now provides many dialog generation utilities
API trình cắm hiện cung cấp nhiều tiện ích tạo hộp thoại
API za dodatke sada obezbeđuje brojne alatke za pravljene prozorčića
АПИ за додатке сада обезбеђује бројне алатке за прављене прозорчића
Plug-in API biedt nu veel hulpprogramma's voor het genereren van dialoogvensters
Plug-in API now provides many dialogue generation utilities

description.p: This is the first development release for GIMP 3.0, whose focus was the port to the GTK+3 toolkit. Noteworthy improvements (though some are still work-in-progress) include:
Đây là bản phát hành phát triển đầu tiên cho GIMP 3.0, có trọng tâm là cổng vào bộ công cụ GTK + 3. Những cải tiến đáng chú ý (mặc dù một số vẫn đang trong quá trình hoàn thiện) bao gồm:
Ovo je prvo razvojno izdanje Gimpa 3.0, gde će fokus biti na prebacivanje programa na Gtk+3 razvojni alat. Unapređenja koja su vredna pomena (iako su neka još uvek u razvoju) uključuju:
Ово је прво развојно издање Гимпа 3.0, где ће фокус бити на пребацивање програма на Гтк+3 развојни алат. Унапређења која су вредна помена (иако су нека још увек у развоју) укључују:
Dit is de eerste ontwikkelingsrelease voor GIMP 3.0, waarvan de focus lag op de poort naar de GTK +3-toolkit. Opmerkelijke verbeteringen (hoewel sommige nog onderhanden zijn) zijn onder meer:
This is the first development release for GIMP 3.0, whose focus was the port to the GTK+3 toolkit. Noteworthy improvements (though some are still work-in-progress) include:

ul.li: Multi-selection of layers in the Layers dockable
Chọn nhiều lớp cùng lúc trong lớp neo được
Izbor više sloja u prikačivim slojevima
Избор више слоја у прикачивим слојевима
Meerdere lagen kunnen selecteren in het Lagenvenster
Sélection multiple de calques dans le groupe de calques
Multi-selection of layers in the Layers dockable
Proper high pixel density display support
Hỗ trợ hiển thị mật độ điểm ảnh cao thích hợp
Podrška za ispravan prikaz piksela velike gustine
Подршка за исправан приказ пиксела велике густине
Goede ondersteuning voor beeldschermen met hoge pixeldichtheid
Proper high pixel density display support
Improved input device support
Cải thiện hỗ trợ các thiết bị đầu vào
Poboljšana podrška za ulazne uređaje
Побољшана подршка за улазне уређаје
Verbeterd gebruik van Invoerapparaten
入力デバイスのサポートの改善
Amélioration de la prise en charge des périphériques d’entrée
Improved input device support
Major plug-in API rewrite
Viết lại API trình cắm thêm chính
API za dodatke je kompletno redizajniran i napisan od početka
АПИ за додатке је комплетно редизајниран и написан од почетка
De programmeeromgeving voor plugin's in grotendeels herschreven
主要なプラグイン API の書き直し
Major plug-in API rewrite
Plug-in API now available in C/C++, Python 3, Javascript, Lua and Vala
API dành cho chương trình bổ sung giờ sẵn có với các ngôn ngữ C/C++, Python 3, Javascript, Lua và Vala
API za dodatke je dostupan za C/C++, Pajton, Java skript, Lua i Vala
АПИ за додатке је доступан за Ц/Ц++, Пајтон, Јава скрипт, Луа и Вала
De programmeeromgeving voor plugin's is beschikbaar in C/C++, Python 3, Javascript, Lua en Vala
プラグイン API は現在 C/C++、Python 3、Javascript、Lua、Vala で利用可能です
Plug-in API now available in C/C++, Python 3, JavaScript, Lua and Vala
New manageable extension format
Định dạng mở rộng quản lý được mới
Novi, upravljivi format proširenja
Нови, управљиви формат проширења
Nieuw beheerbaar formaat voor extensies
Amasal amaynut n usiɣzef yettwasefraken
New manageable extension format
CSS-based themes and actual symbolic icon theme support
Chủ đề dựa trên CSS và hỗ trợ sắc thái biểu tượng tượng trưng thực tế
Teme u CSS kodu i podrška za simboličke ikonice
Теме у CSS коду и подршка за симболичке иконице
Op CSS gebaseerde thema’s en daadwerkelijke ondersteuning voor pictogramthema’s
CSS-based themes and actual symbolic icon theme support
Wayland support
Hỗ trợ Wayland
Podrška za Vejlend
Подршка за Вејленд
Ondersteuning voor Wayland
Wayland のサポート
Wayland support

description.p: This new version of GIMP comes with many fixes, including vulnerability corrections. It is highly recommended to update. It also provides a few interesting changes, such as:

ul.li: Adobe ACB and ASE palette support
New gradient: FG to Transparent (Hardedge)
Some text tool algorithm enhancement when replacing formatted text
Better theming of item locks (when hovering them or setting them active)
Improvements in handling a few specific metadata

description.p: A new stable releases with a lot of bug fixes and a few enhancements:
Nowe stabilne wydanie z wieloma poprawkami błędów i kilkoma ulepszeniami:

ul.li: New template selector in "Canvas Size" dialog
Nowa opcja wyboru szablonu w oknie „Wymiary płótna”
"Change Color" dialogs: color scale (0..255/0..100) and models (LCh/HSV) settings remembered across sessions
Okna „Zmień kolor”: ustawienia skali kolorów (0…255/0…100) i modeli (LCh/HSV) są zapamiętywane między sesjami
New header with "visible" and "link" icons in item dockables
Nowy nagłówek z ikonami „widoczne” i „dowiązanie” w panelach elementów
Clipping layers better supported when importing PSD files
Przycinanie warstw jest lepiej obsługiwane podczas importowania plików PSD
Paths are now exported to PSD
Ścieżki są teraz eksportowane do plików PSD
JPEG XL export added
Dodano obsługę eksportu do JPEG XL
Metadata in JPEG XL import
Obsługa metadanych w imporcie JPEG XL
New option "Show reduced images" when loading TIFF images
Nowa opcja „Wyświetlanie zmniejszonych obrazów” podczas wczytywania obrazów TIFF
16-bit per channel export for raw image data
Eksport 16 bitów na kanał w danych obrazów Raw
More plug-ins got bug-fixes: DDS, WebP, Flame, Animation Playback, HEIF, Dicom and Help
Więcej wtyczek otrzymało poprawki błędów: DDS, WebP, Płomień, Odtwarzanie animacji, HEIF, Dicom i Pomoc
Color picking on X11 will ignore the Wayland portal; new implementation for color picking on Windows
Wybór koloru na X11 będzie ignorował portal Wayland, nowa implementacja wyboru koloru w systemie Windows
Check for updates fixed on macOS
Naprawiono wyszukiwanie aktualizacji w systemie macOS

description.p: GIMP continues strengthening its bases with this new version 2.10.32 fixing many bugs and improving format support. Notable changes:
GIMP kontynuuje wzmacnianie swoich podstaw w nowej wersji 2.10.32, która naprawia błędy i ulepsza obsługę różnych formatów:
GIMP blijft zijn basis versterken met deze nieuwe versie 2.10.32 die veel bugs oplost en de ondersteuning voor formaten verbetert. Opvallende veranderingen:

ul.li: 8 and 16-bit CMYK(A) TIFF files import is now supported
Obsługiwany jest teraz import 8- i 16-bitowych plików TIFF w CMYK(A)
Het importeren van 8- en 16-bits CMYK(A)-TIFF-bestanden wordt nu ondersteund
BIGTIFF import and export are now supported
Obsługiwany jest teraz import i eksport plików BIGTIFF
BIGTIFF-import en -export worden nu ondersteund
JPEG XL files import is now supported
Obsługiwany jest teraz import plików JPEG XL
Het importeren van JPEG XL-bestanden wordt nu ondersteund
DDS export has new "Flip" (useful for some game engine) and "Visible layers" options
Eksport plików DDS ma teraz opcje odbicia (przydatne przy niektórych silnikach gier) i widocznych warstw
DDS-export heeft nieuwe opties ‘Spiegelen’ (handig voor sommige game-engines) en ‘Zichtbare lagen’
Other improved format supports: BMP, DICOM, EPS, RAW, TGA, WebP
Ulepszona obsługa innych formatów: BMP, DICOM, EPS, RAW, TGA i WebP
Verbeterde ondersteuning voor andere formaten: BMP, DICOM, EPS, RAW, TGA, WebP
The screenshot plug-in on Windows has now an option to capture the cursor
Wtyczka wykonywania zrzutów ekranu w systemie Windows ma teraz opcję zachowania kursora na zrzucie
De schermafdrukplug-in op Windows heeft nu een optie om de muisaanwijzer vast te leggen
Several usability improvements in official themes and icons
Kilka ulepszeń użyteczności w oficjalnych motywach i ikonach
Verschillende bruikbaarheidsverbeteringen in officiële thema’s en pictogrammen
New support for localized glyphs ('locl') in Text tool depending on the value of the "Language" tool option
Nowa obsługa lokalizowanych glifów („locl”) w narzędziu tekstowym w zależności od wartości opcji „Język” narzędzia
Nieuwe ondersteuning voor gelokaliseerde glyphs (‘locl’) in het gereedschap Tekst, afhankelijk van de waarde van de optie van het gereedschap ‘Taal’
More robust XCF import
Solidniejszy import plików XCF
Robuustere XCF-import
Several metadata handling improvements
Kilka ulepszeń obsługi metadanych
Verschillende verbeteringen in de verwerking van metagegevens

description.p: GIMP 2.10.30 fixes many bugs, updates backend implementations to follow OS evolutions, improves metadata support as well as support of several formats, such as PSD and AVIF.
GIMP 2.10.30 naprawia wiele błędów, aktualizuje implementacje mechanizmów zgodnie ze zmianami w systemach operacyjnych, ulepsza obsługę metadanych oraz kilku formatów, takich jak PSD i AVIF.
GIMP 2.10.30 lost veel bugs op, werkt backend-implementaties bij om OS-versies te volgen, verbetert metagegevens-ondersteuning en ondersteuning van verschillende beeldformaten, zoals PSD en AVIF.
GIMP 2.10.30 fixes many bugs, updates backend implementations to follow OS evolutions, improves metadata support as well as support of several formats, such as PSD and AVIF.
GIMP 2.10.28 fixes a build issue of GIMP 2.10.26, where some theme data was not properly installed.
GIMP 2.10.28 naprawia problem podczas budowania wydania 2.10.26, przez który część danych motywu nie była właściwie instalowana.
GIMP 2.10.28 corrigeert een build-probleem van GIMP 2.10.26, waarbij sommige themagegevens niet correct waren geïnstalleerd.
GIMP 2.10.28 izlabo būvēšanas problēmas GIMP 2.10.26 versija, kur dažu motīvu dati netika pareizi uzinstalēti.
GIMP 2.10.28 fixes a build issue of GIMP 2.10.26, where some theme data was not properly installed.
GIMP 2.10.26 is a bug fix release, containing dozens of fixes, both in core, scripts and plug-in code.
GIMP 2.10.26 là một bản phát hành sửa lỗi, chứa hàng chục bản sửa lỗi, cả về lõi, tập lệnh và mã plug-in.
GIMP 2.10.26 zawiera dziesiątki poprawek błędów, zarówno w głównym programie, jak i skryptach oraz wtyczkach.
GIMP 2.10.26 is een foutoplossingsuitgave, met tientallen foutoplossingen, zowel in de core, de scripts als in de plug-incode.
GIMP 2.10.26 is a bug fix release, containing dozens of fixes, both in core, scripts and plug-in code.
GIMP 2.10.24 is again mostly a bug fix release. Notable changes:
GIMP 2.10.24 được hưởng các sửa lỗi. Các thay đổi đáng kể:
GIMP 2.10.24 ponownie zawiera głównie poprawki błędów:
GIMP 2.10.24 is voornamelijk een uitgave met foutoplossingen. Verbeteringen zijn:
GIMP 2.10.24 atkal ir pārsvarā kļūdu labojumi. Būtiskās izmaiņas:
GIMP 2.10.24 daɣen d aseɣti n ibugen. Ibeddilen yettbanen:
GIMP 2.10.24 est encore une publication essentiellement de correction de bogues et d’optimisation. Elle contient en particulier :
GIMP 2.10.24 is again mostly a bug fix release. Notable changes:

ul.li: GeoTIFF metadata support added
Thêm hỗ trợ tính năng siêu dữ liệu GeoTIFF
Dodano obsługę metadanych GeoTIFF
GeoTIFF-metagegevens worden nu ondersteund
GeoTIFF metadata support added
PDF import now proposes an option to load layers in reverse orders and allows fractional pixel density
Nhập PDF bây giờ đề xuất một tùy chọn để tải các lớp theo thứ tự ngược lại và cho phép mật độ điểm ảnh phân số
Import plików PDF oferuje teraz opcję wczytania warstw w odwróconej kolejności i umożliwia korzystanie z ułamkowej gęstości pikseli
PDF-import biedt nu de optie om lagen in omgekeerde volgorde te laden en kent decimale waarden voor pixeldichtheid
PDF import now proposes an option to load layers in reverse orders and allows fractional pixel density
Raw image import updated to handle API changes in darktable 3.6 and over
Nhập ảnh thô được cập nhật để xử lý các thay đổi API trong darktable 3.6 trở lên
Zaktualizowano import obrazów Raw do obsługi zmian API w darktable 3.6 i nowszych
Import van raw-afbeeldingen respecteert de API-veranderingen in darktable 3.6 en hoger
Raw image import updated to handle API changes in darktable 3.6 and over
File format improved support: HEIF, PSP, TIFF, JPEG, PNG, PDF, DDS, BMP, PSD
Các định dạng tập tin được tăng cường hỗ trợ: HEIF, PSP, TIFF, JPEG, PNG, PDF, DDS, BMP, PSD
Ulepszono obsługę formatów plików HEIF, PSP, TIFF, JPEG, PNG, PDF, DDS, BMP i PSD
Verbeterde ondersteuning van de bestandsformaten: HEIF, PSP, TIFF, JPEG, PNG, PDF, DDS, BMP en PSD
File format improved support: HEIF, PSP, TIFF, JPEG, PNG, PDF, DDS, BMP, PSD
Many fixes and improvements to the metadata viewer and editor
Sửa và cải tiến nhiều cho việc xem và sửa siêu dữ liệu
Wiele poprawek i ulepszeń w przeglądarce i edytorze metadanych
Veel oplossingen en verbeteringen aan de metadataviewer en editor
Many fixes and improvements to the metadata viewer and editor
New Kabyle translation
Bản dịch Kabyle mới
Nowe tłumaczenie na język kabylski
Nieuwe Kabyle-vertaling
Nouvelle traduction en kabyle
New Kabyle translation
Off-canvas point snapping (to grid, guides, paths) made possible
Bắt dính điểm ngoài vùng vẽ (vào lưới, đường dẫn hướng, các đường dẫn)
Przyciąganie do punktów (siatki, prowadnic, ścieżek) poza obszarem rysowania jest teraz możliwe
Magnetisch kleven (aan raster, hulplijnen, paden) aan punten buiten het canvas is nu mogelijk
Off-canvas point snapping (to grid, guides, paths) made possible

description.p: GIMP 2.10.22 is mainly a bug fix release. Notable changes:
GIMP 2.10.22 chủ yếu là một bản phát hành để sửa lỗi. Các thay đổi đáng kể:
Gimp 2.10.22 uglavnom uključuje ispravke grešaka. Primetne promene:
Гимп 2.10.22 углавном укључује исправке грешака. Приметне промене:
GIMP 2.10.22 zawiera głównie poprawki błędów:
GIMP 2.10.22 is voornamelijk een release met bug-fixes. Verbeteringen zijn:
GIMP 2.10.22 ir pārsvarā kļūdu labojumu. Būtiskās izmaiņas:
GIMP 2.10.22 s umata d aseɣti n ibugen. Ibeddilen yettbanen:
GIMP 2.10.22 はバグ修正を主としたリリースです。主な変更点:
GIMP 2.10.22 est principalement une version de corrections de bogues. Les changements notables :
GIMP 2.10.22 is mainly a bug fix release. Notable changes:

ul.li: HEIF support improvements: optional exporting with high bit depth, AVIF importing and exporting
Cải tiến hỗ trợ HEIF: xuất với tùy chọn độ sâu bit cao, nhập và xuất AVIF
Unapređena HEIF podrška: opcioni izvoz sa velikom gustinom bitova, uvoz i izvoz u AVIF
Унапређена HEIF подршка: опциони извоз са великом густином битова, увоз и извоз у AVIF
Ulepszenia obsługi formatu HEIF: opcjonalne eksportowanie z wysoką głębią, import i eksport AVIF
Verbeterde HEIF-ondersteuning: optioneel exporteren met grote bitdiepte, AVIF import en export
Améliorations de prise en charge du format HEIF : exportation facultative avec grande profondeur de bits, importation et exportation AVIF
HEIF support improvements: optional exporting with high bit depth, AVIF importing and exporting
Multiple improvements in Corel PaintShop Pro support
Hỗ trợ nhiều cải tiến trong Corel PaintShop Pro
Brojna unapređenja u podršci za Corel PaintShop Pro
Бројна унапређења у подршци за Corel PaintShop Pro
Wiele ulepszeń obsługi plików programu Corel PaintShop Pro
Diverse verbeteringen in de ondersteuning van Corel PaintShop Pro
Aṭas n uwenneɛ di tedhelt n Corel PaintShop Pro
Améliorations multiples dans la prise en charge de Corel PaintShop Pro
Multiple improvements in Corel PaintShop Pro support
"Sample merged" now available in GEGL operation tool options
“Sample merged” giờ sẵn có trong tùy chọn công cụ thao tác GEGL
„Spojeni uzorak“ je sada dostupan u opcijama alata za Geglove radnje
„Спојени узорак“ је сада доступан у опцијама алата за Геглове радње
„Próbkowanie wszystkich warstw” jest teraz dostępne w opcjach narzędzi działań biblioteki GEGL
"Samengevoegd monsteren" nu beschikbaar in GEGL-gereedschap opties
"Sample merged" yewjed tura di tnefrunin n ufecku n tmehlin
"Sample merged" now available in GEGL operation tool options
"Sample merged" is now enabled by default for color picking
“Sample merged” giờ được bật theo mặc định dành cho việc chọn màu
„Spojeni uzorak“ je sada podrazumevano omogućen za izbor boja
„Спојени узорак“ је сада подразумевано омогућен за избор боја
„Próbkowanie wszystkich warstw” jest teraz domyślnie włączone podczas wybierania koloru
"Samengevoegd monsteren" nu standaard ingeschakeld in de kleurenkiezer
"Sample merged" tura yermed s lexṣas i welqaḍ n yiniten
"Sample merged" is now enabled by default for colour picking
The option enabling OpenCL support has been moved to the Playground tab in Preferences
Tùy chọn bật hỗ trợ OpenCL được di chuyển đến thẻ Sân chơi trong Tùy thích
Opcije koja omogućava OpenCL podršku je premeštena u karticu Igralište unutar Podešavanja
Опције која омогућава OpenCL подршку је премештена у картицу Игралиште унутар Подешавања
Opcja włączenia obsługi OpenCL została przeniesiona do karty „Plac zabaw” w preferencjach
De optie om OpenCL ondersteuning in te schakelen in verplaatst naar de Experimentele afdeling in Voorkeuren
Iɣewwaren n OpenCL muttin ɣer yiɣewwaren n Playground
L’option activant la prise en charge OpenCL a été déplacée dans l’onglet « Aire de jeu » des préférences
The option enabling OpenCL support has been moved to the Playground tab in Preferences
Matting Levin is now the default engine of Foreground Select tool as it performs a lot better
Khớp Levin giờ là bộ máy mặc định dành cho công cụ chọn Nền vì nó có hiệu năng tốt hơn
Meting Levin (Matting Levin) je sada podrazumevani motor alata za izdvajanje pozadine pošto se pokazao boljim
Метинг Левин (Matting Levin) је сада подразумевани мотор алата за издвајање позадине пошто се показао бољим
Mierzwienie Levina to teraz domyślny mechanizm zaznaczania pierwszego planu, jako że jest o wiele wydajniejszy
Matting Levin is nu de standaardmethode van het Voorgrondselectie-gereedschap omdat het veel beter presteert
L’extraction Levin est dorénavant le moteur par défaut de l’outil de sélection de premier plan car il est bien plus efficace
Matting Levin is now the default engine of Foreground Select tool as it performs a lot better
New progressive performance logs and dashboard updates
Novi dnevnik naprednih performansi i unapređenja komandne table
Нови дневник напредних перформанси и унапређења командне табле
Nowe przyrostowe dzienniki wydajności i aktualizacje panelu wydajności
Nieuwe doorlopende prestatie logboek en dashboard verbeteringen
Aɣmis amaynut n temellit s usfari akked yileqman n tfelwit n tedbelt
New progressive performance logs and dashboard updates
Verbose debug now shows Flatpak info when relevant
Gỡ lỗi chi tiết giờ hiển thị thông tin Flatpak khi thích hợp
Detaljnija pretraga greški sada prikazuje podatke za Fletpak ukoliko je potrebno
Детаљнија претрага грешки сада приказује податке за Флетпак уколико је потребно
Zwiększone komunikaty debugowania wyświetlają teraz informacje pakietu Flatpak, kiedy jest używany
Uitgebreide foutopsporing toont nu Flatpak-informatie wanneer dit relevant is
Verbose debug now shows Flatpak info when relevant
Various bug fixes
Sửa nhiều lỗi khác nhau
Rane ispravke grešaka
Ране исправке грешака
Różne poprawki błędów
Diverse bugs verholpen
Aṭas n iseɣtiyen n ibugen
Diverses résolutions de bogues
Various bug fixes

description.p: GIMP 2.10.20 comes with new features as well as important bugfixes. Notable changes:
GIMP 2.10.20 đi kèm với các tính năng mới cũng như sửa các lỗi quan trọng. Những thay đổi đáng chú ý:
Gimp 2.10.20 dolazi sa novim mogućnostima i ispravkama važnih grešaka. Vidljive promene:
Гимп 2.10.20 долази са новим могућностима и исправкама важних грешака. Видљиве промене:
GIMP 2.10.20 zawiera nowe funkcje oraz ważne poprawki błędów:
GIMP 2.10.20 kent zowel bug-fixes als nieuwe elementen. Belangrijkste veranderingen zijn:
GIMP 2.10.20 iekļauj jaunas iespējas un svarīgu kļūdu labojumus. Ievērojamākās izmaiņas:
GIMP 2.10.20 yusa-d s twuriwin timaynutin akked yiseɣtiyen imaqranen n ibugen. Ibeddilen yettbanen:
GIMP 2.10.20 apporte de nouvelles fonctions et un grand nombre de corrections de bogues. Les changements les plus notables sont :
GIMP 2.10.20 comes with new features as well as important bugfixes. Notable changes:
GIMP 2.10.20 vien con carauterístiques nueves, y con igües importantes de fallos. Cambeos bultables:

ul.li: Tool groups now expand on hover rather than click by default
Các nhóm công cụ giờ mở rộng khi di chuột qua thay vì phải bấm chuột theo mặc định
Grupa alata se sada može širi kada pređete preko nje umesto da morate da kliknete
Група алата се сада може шири када пређете преко ње уместо да морате да кликнете
Grupy narzędzi są teraz domyślnie rozwijane po najechaniu zamiast kliknięciu
Gereedschapsgroepen klikken open als de muis erover beweegt, in plaats van erop te moeten klikken
Igrawen n yifecka fettin tura s usrifeg n tɣerdayt mačči s ussiti
Les groupes d’outils se développent dorénavant par défaut au survol plutôt qu’au clic
Tool groups now expand on hover rather than click by default
Los grupos de ferramientes agora ábrense, de manera predeterminada, al pasar el mur, en vez de al calcar
Non-destructive cropping now available by cropping the canvas rather than actual pixels
Cắt xén không phá hủy hiện có sẵn bằng cách xém vùng vẽ thay vì xén các điểm ảnh thực tế
Nedestruktivno isecanje je dostupno tako što isecate platno a ne prave piksele
Недеструктивно исецање је доступно тако што исецате платно а не праве пикселе
Niedestrukcyjne kadrowanie dzięki kadrowaniu obszaru rysowania zamiast pikseli
Niet-destructief bijsnijden nu beschikbaar door het canvas bij te snijden in plaats van de feitelijke pixels
Aɣẓaẓ ur netthuddu yara yewjed tura s uɣẓaẓ n teɣzut n usuneɣ deg umḍiq n yipikselen
Un rognage non destructif est disponible en rognant le canevas plutôt que les pixels eux-mêmes
Non-destructive cropping now available by cropping the canvas rather than actual pixels
Hai disponible un recorte non destructivu recortando'l llenzu en vez de píxeles reales
Better PSD support: exporting of 16-bit files now available, reading/writing channels in the right order
Hỗ trợ PSD tốt hơn: xuất các tệp 16 bit hiện có sẵn, các kênh đọc / ghi theo đúng thứ tự
Bolja podrška za PSD: izvoz u 16-to bitne datoteke je dostupan, kao i čitanje/upis pravilnim redosledom
Боља подршка за PSD: извоз у 16-то битне датотеке је доступан, као и читање/упис правилним редоследом
Lepsza obsługa plików PSD: eksport plików 16-bitowych, odczyt/zapis kanałów we właściwej kolejności
Betere PSD-ondersteuning: export van 16-bit bestanden nu beschikbaar, lezen/schrijven van kanalen in de juiste volgorde
Tadhelt n PSD tif tin n zik: asifeḍ n yifuyla n 16-ibiten yewjed tura, taɣuri/tira n yibuda deg umizzwer iwatan
Meilleure prise en compte du format PSD : l’exportation des fichiers 16 bits est maintenant disponible, avec lecture ou écriture des canaux dans le bon ordre
Better PSD support: exporting of 16-bit files now available, reading/writing channels in the right order
Meyor sofitu PSD: esportación de ficheros de 16 bits disponibles agora, llectura / escritura de canales nel orde correchu
On-canvas controls for the Vignette filter
Điều khiển trên canvas cho bộ lọc Vignette
Kontrole alata za vinjetarenje na platnu
Контроле алата за вињетарење на платну
Sterowanie filtrem winiety na obszarze rysowania
Instellingen voor het Vignettefilter direct op het canvas geplaatst
Isenqaden n testayt n tebzimt ɣef teɣzut n usuneɣ
Réglages sur canevas pour le filtre Vignette
On-canvas controls for the Vignette filter
Controles en llenzu pa la peñera de viñeta
New filters: Bloom, Focus Blur, Lens Blur, Variable Blur
Các bộ lọc mới: Bloom, Focus Blur, Lens Blur, Variable Blur
Novi filteri: Cvetanje, Zamućenje fokusa, Zamućenje objektiva i Promenljivo zamućenje
Нови филтери: Цветање, Замућење фокуса, Замућење објектива и Променљиво замућење
Nowe filtry: poświata, rozmycie ostrości, rozmycie soczewki, zmienne rozmycie
Nieuwe filters: Verbloemen, Focusvervaging, Lensvervaging, Variabele vervaging
Tistayin timaynutin: tajeǧǧigt, aluɣu s uaḍes, aluɣu n tniltit, aluɣu ameskil
Nouveaux filtres : Flou lumineux, Flou de mise au point, Flou de lentille, Flou variable
New filters: Bloom, Focus Blur, Lens Blur, Variable Blur
Peñeres nueves: Flor, difuminación de focu, difuminación de llente, difuminación variable
Over 30 bugfixes
Sửa hơn 30 lỗi
Ispravka nešto više od 30 grešaka
Исправка нешто више од 30 грешака
Ponad 30 poprawek błędów
Ruim 30 fouten opgelost
Ugar n 30 n iseɣtiyen n ibugen
Plus de 30 résolutions de bogues
Over 30 bugfixes
Más de 30 igües de fallos

description.p: GIMP 2.10.18 fixes some critical bugs, introduces naive support for CMYK PSD files, and adds a higher-contrast variation of the symbolic icon theme.
Gimp 2.10.18 ispravlja kritične greške, uvodi podršku za CMYK PSD datoteke i dodaje više kontrasnih tema za simboličke ikonice.
Гимп 2.10.18 исправља критичне грешке, уводи подршку за CMYK PSD датотеке и додаје више контрасних тема за симболичке иконице.
GIMP 2.10.18 naprawia kilka krytycznych błędów, wprowadza prostą obsługę plików PSD w przestrzeni kolorów CMYK oraz dodaje wersję symbolicznego zestawu ikon o zwiększonym kontraście.
Gimp 2.10.18 kent enkele belangrijke bug-fixes, introduceert ondersteuning van CMYK PSD-bestanden en biedt nu ook een hoogcontrastvariant van de symbolische pictogrammen.
GIMP 2.10.18 iseɣti kra n ibugen iweɛren, iskecm-d tadhelt taḥerfit i yifuyla CMYK PSD, daɣen yerna acali n umyeẓli-afellay i tignit n usentel azamulan.
GIMP 2.10.18 corrige quelques anomalies critiques, introduit une prise en charge native des fichiers PSD CMYK et ajoute une variation à plus fort contraste du thème d’icônes symboliques.
GIMP 2.10.18 fixes some critical bugs, introduces naive support for CMYK PSD files, and adds a higher-contrast variation of the symbolic icon theme.
GIMP 2.10.18 igua dellos problemes críticos, presenta soporte inxenuu pa ficheros PSD CMYK y amiesta una variación de mayor contraste del tema de iconu simbólicu.
GIMP 2.10.16 delivers several major usability improvements, a new tool for transformations in 3D space, new release checker, and the usual amount of bug fixes. Notable improvements:
GIMP 2.10.16 釋出許多重大的使用性改善，新的 3D 變形工具、新的檢查器、以及一如往常的錯誤修正。值得一提的改善有：
Gimp 2.10.16 donosi nekoliko većih uapređenja, novi alat za preobrađaj u 3D okruženju, mogućnost provere za novim izdanjima programa i uobičajenu količinu ispravljenih grešaka. Vidna unapređenja:
Гимп 2.10.16 доноси неколико већих уапређења, нови алат за преобрађај у 3Д окружењу, могућност провере за новим издањима програма и уобичајену количину исправљених грешака. Видна унапређења:
GIMP 2.10.16 zawiera kilka dużych ulepszeń użyteczności, nowe narzędzie do przekształcania w przestrzeni trójwymiarowej, narzędzie do wyszukiwania aktualizacji oraz zwyczajowo wiele poprawek błędów:

GIMP 2.10.16 bevat enkele belangrijke verbeteringen mbt. de bruikbaarheid, een nieuw gereedschap voor 3D-transformaties, een nieuwe versiechecker en de gebruikelijke hoeveelheid foutoplossingen. Opmerkelijke verbeteringen zijn:
GIMP 2.10.16 yefka-d aṭas n yiweniɛen imeqranen i usishel n useqdec, afecku amaynut i weselket di tallunt 3D, asenqad n yileqman imaynuten, akked yiseɣtiten n ibugen. Iwenniɛen yetbanen:

GIMP-2.10.16 apporte plusieurs améliorations majeures d’utilisation, un nouvel outil pour des transformations dans l’espace 3D, un nouvel explorateur de version, et le lot habituel de résolutions de bogues. Améliorations notables :
GIMP 2.10.16 delivers several major usability improvements, a new tool for transformations in 3D space, new release checker, and the usual amount of bug fixes. Notable improvements:

GIMP 2.10.16 ufierta delles meyores importantes d'usabilidá, nuna ferramienta nueva pa tresformaciones nel espaciu 3D, un comprobador de versiones y la cantidá de davezu d'igües de fallos. Meyores a destacar:

ul.li: Tools are now grouped in the toolbox by default
Các công cụ giờ được nhóm vào các hộp công cụ theo mặc định
Alati su sada podrazumevano grupisani u Alatnici
Алати су сада подразумевано груписани у Алатници
Narzędzia w przyborniku są teraz domyślnie grupowane
Gereedschappen zijn in de gereedschapskist nu standaard gegroepeerd
Ifecka ttusgerwen tura s lexṣas di tenkult n yifecka
Les outils sont maintenant groupés dans la Boîte à outils par défaut
Tools are now grouped in the toolbox by default
Les ferramientes agora tán agrupaes na caxa de ferramientes de mena predeterminada
Sliders now use a compact style with improved user interaction
Con trượt giờ đây sử dụng kiểm gọn để cải thiện giao diện người dùng
Klizači koriste kompaktni stil i unapređuju interakciju sa korisnikom
Клизачи користе компактни стил и унапређују интеракцију са корисником
Suwaki mają teraz zwarty styl i lepiej się ich używa
Schuifbalken zijn compacter gemaakt en beter te bedienen
Timaccagin sseqdacent tura aɣanib akussim susedmer n useqdac iwenɛen
Les curseurs utilisent maintenant un style compact avec une interaction utilisateur améliorée
Sliders now use a compact style with improved user interaction
Los controles esllizantes agora usen un estilu compautu pa una interaición ameyorada col usuariu
Vastly improved user experience for the transformation preview
Dosta je unapređeno korisničko iskustvo pri pregledu preobražaja
Доста је унапређено корисничко искуство при прегледу преображаја
Znacznie ulepszony interfejs podglądu przekształceń
Veel verbeterd in het gebruik van het Voorbeeld van transformatiegereedschappen
Awenneɣ n termit n useqdac i tmuɣli n uselket
Expérience utilisateur largement améliorée pour l’aperçu de transformation
Vastly improved user experience for the transformation preview
Esperiencia d'usuariu abondo ameyorada na vista previa de tresformaciones
Dockable areas now highlighted when a dockable dialog is being dragged
Područje za prikačivanje je sada istaknuto kada prevlačite prikačivi prozorčić
Подручје за прикачивање је сада истакнуто када превлачите прикачиви прозорчић
Obszary, do których można przypiąć okna dialogowe są teraz wyróżniane
De dokbare gebieden lichten nu op wanneer je een dokbaar dialoogvenster verplaatst
Tiɣezza inettun tura ad ttusebrurqent mi ara tzuɣreḍ tankult n udiwenni inettun
Les zones ancrables sont maintenant surlignées quand une boîte de dialogue ancrable est en cours de glissement
Dockable areas now highlighted when a dockable dialogue is being dragged
Les estayes acoplables agora resáltense cuando s'arrastra un diálogu acoplable
New 3D Transform tool to rotate and pan items
Novi alat za 3D preobražaj za rotiranje i pomeranje stavki
Нови алат за 3Д преображај за ротирање и померање ставки
Nowe narzędzie przekształceń 3D do obracania i przesuwania obiektów
Nieuw 3D transformatiegereedschap om objecten te draaien en schuiven
Afecku amaynut n uselket 3D i tuzzya akked tuttya n yiferdisen
Nouvel outil Transformation 3D pour faire tourner et défiler des objets
New 3D Transform tool to rotate and pan items
Nueva ferramienta de tresformación 3D pa rotar y desplazar elementos
Much smoother brush outline motion on the canvas
Mnogo uglađeniji pokreti četkice na platnu
Много углађенији покрети четкице на платну
Znacznie płynniejszy ruch obwódki pędzla na obszarze rysowania
Penseel veel soepeler gemaakt
Mouvement de contour de brosse beaucoup plus doux sur le canevas
Much smoother brush outline motion on the canvas
El movimientu del contornu del pincel ye muncho más suave penriba'l llenzu
Consolidated user interface for merging down and anchoring layers
Sastavljeno korisničko sučelje za spajanje sa slojevima ispod i usidravanje
Састављено корисничко сучеље за спајање са слојевима испод и усидравање
Scalony interfejs do łączenia i zakotwiczania warstw
Geïntegreerde interface om lagen samen te voegen en te verankeren
Konsolidēta lietotāja saskarne slāņu apvienošanai un fiksēšanai
Agrudem n useqdac yettuwenneɛ i wesmezdi akked usenttu n tissiyin
